subject: Re: [LH] Kate Bush -- Bad Neighbor! (more details)
body:
yellowmattercustard wrote:
> Donny Bravo wrote:
> 
>> Global Warming is not about pollution. It's about carbon 
>> dioxide...supposedly.
>>
>> I will never agree that carbon dioxide is pollution. In fact, without 
>> carbon dioxide, there's no photosynthesis and we all die.
> 
> Fucking hopeless.
> 
> It's like talking to a brick wall.

I disagree.
Donny does have valid points. And people do seem to jump on the fashionable
bandwagon, which is currently "carbon footprints" (and "organic farming",
although I didn't know anything inorganic could ever grow).

And on the topic of organic farming (since I brought it up), I find
it interesting after a few years of that fad, that many scientists
are now showing that "organic" products are not any tastier, nor any
better nutrient-wise, and that fertilizing with sh*t carries way more
risks and contains nasty by-products.

Humans really don't have a clue, do they!
